definition: to be drenched with blood/dripping blood

sentences.english: He was a murderer whose hands reeked with blood.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個雙手沾滿鮮血的殺人犯。

sentences.english: The enemy was advancing. The snow was stained with blood.
sentences.chinese: 首都被迫棄守，敵人步步進逼，鮮血將白雪浸染。

sentences.english: But his eyes were also bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 眼中卻是一片鮮血淋漓。

sentences.english: We had some more new blood on our team.
sentences.chinese: 新鮮血液輸入了我們的隊伍中。

sentences.english: The floor was splattered with blood, and the ambassador's eyeglasses lay a few feet from his body.
sentences.chinese: 鮮血濺了一地，大使的眼鏡掉在他屍體的不遠處。

sentences.english: The soldier rode on, with blood flowing from his right side.
sentences.chinese: 士兵騎馬繼續跑着，鮮血從右肋流了下來。

sentences.english: She made up the art gallery with like, blood splatters across the walls and stuff like that.
sentences.chinese: 她開了個美術館，那牆上滿是鮮血四濺的東西。

sentences.english: Gather forth the White Oil, the Black Cup and the Blood of the Ten Sinners.
sentences.chinese: 在我面前放下白油，黑色的杯子和十個罪人的鮮血。

sentences.english: The wife who becomes an emperor a full blood the greatly hugs in the bosom, pain not the desire living.
sentences.chinese: 大成皇上把沁滿鮮血的妻子摟在懷裏，痛不欲生。

sentences.english: She looked at finally, make a vow tree, blood of her spatter everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 她最後看了一眼，許願樹上，她的鮮血濺得哪兒都是。

sentences.english: The more blood that is offered to the Gods, the more readily they are appeased .
sentences.chinese: 用於獻祭鮮血愈多，諸神便會愈加愉悅。

sentences.english: Beggared of blood to blush through lively veins.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏鮮血去灌注淡紅的脈絡？

sentences.english: The spurting blood turned the white mulberry tree into a dark purple.
sentences.chinese: 那飛濺的鮮血把那棵白桑樹也染成了深紫色。

sentences.english: And blood splatters everywhere in glorious slow motion.
sentences.chinese: 而且把四濺的鮮血用慢鏡頭來加以美化。

sentences.english: Of bug of a legendary venomous insect gobble up below, the veil of nitty-gritty is dripping blood.
sentences.chinese: 蠱蟲的吞噬下，事實真相的面紗滴着鮮血。

sentences.english: Blood and treasure are the costs of war.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭的代價就是鮮血和財富。

definition: spout/spray/belch/to well up/to puff out/to spurt out
tongue/CL:個|个[ge4]/enemy soldier captured for the purpose of extracting information
